Posts.Content: Hi all I've come back from my GP appointment after noticing puckering in one breast which was making me anxious as it was.....at my appointment she also found 3 lumps two in one breast and 1 in the other. ..urgent referral has been done I'm in total shock and don't know what to do with myself I'm 38 any advice info much appreciated ...the only other thing I remember her saying was that the lumps were smooth ??
Posts.Title: Urgent referral to breast clinic

Posts.Content: Hi what's a GBM4 ....I'm glad you had good news it's reassuring to know x
Posts.Title: Urgent referral to breast clinic

Posts.Content: Thank you Jo sat in work very bleary eyed ...about to go and visit one of my patients (I'm a community  mental health nurse)....I'm in wales so not sure re waiting times the nurse did say i should be seen within two weeks though. My mam is going to come with me to my appointment as my partner will have to be available to pick our little girl up from school.  Thank you for your advice and best wishes fingers crossed I will have some answers soon x
Posts.Title: Urgent referral to breast clinic

Posts.Content: How do people cope with going to work whilst waiting for their referral appointment. ....spending my day mostly in the bathroom sorting my face out and calming down ....
Posts.Title: Work and waiting ....

Posts.Content: Thanks for the reply ladies think it was particularly a bad day as I was on my own all day too much thinking time ......rang the clinic on my break and was told she will ring me either today or tomorrow morning with an appointment date so that resulted in an afternoon staring at my phone .....hopefully hear something tomorrow  It really helps being able to chat on here thank you so much xxx
Posts.Title: Work and waiting ....

Posts.Content: Hi still anxiously  waiting for my appointment at the breast clinic ....am posting on  here as it's this time of night I turn to Dr Google and make myself 100 times worse....how do you guys cope with the wait... Keep going over in my head what the practice nurse said at the appointment. ...I was in that much shock I didn't ask any questions which is out of character for me especially being a nurse (MH) and a nosey bugger.... All I remember  her saying is that there are 3 lumps but they are smooth....I will refer you for an urgent appointment though because you found dimples aswell try not to get anxious it will take two weeks... I'm due to get married early next year and was excited for the twelve month count down / planning to start ....also going on my hen weekend September abroad so lots to plan and look forward  too.... but now I find myself planning for the worse case scenario cancelling everything in my head and having stupid amounts of baths so I can have a good sob without my daughter and partner noticing  Sorry to vent there are a lot of very brave ladies on here my problems are a drop in the ocean in comparison I just feel so stuck and dread going to work tomorrow.... trying to hold it together to speak to depressed and troubled patients when I'm so sad inside myself
Posts.Title: Anxiously waiting ++++

Posts.Content: Thank you misty blue .......I don't even know what I'm looking for nothing seems to match what I see I have what looks like a indentation line running across the underside of one breast but with a faint dimple / dent at the start and end of it ....the nurse found the 3 lumps I didn't know I had any x
Posts.Title: Anxiously waiting ++++

Posts.Content: We do indeed! Thank you for taking time to reply hopefully I will hear something soon xx
Posts.Title: Anxiously waiting ++++
